name: Project.99_1903
description:
Gather every month. Make experimental games. Pack them all. And sell it for 0.99 USD. This month we made 3 games.

* Please note these games are playable on laptop only.

[My Old Spaceship] by Jaewon Yoo, Jooeun Hwang

Please... Please move stupid spaceship...

[HITris] by Sun Park, Jooeun Hwang

Drop the blocks by hitting your monitor.

[SlamBros] by David Lee, Jooeun Hwang

You have no super jump like his, but have super hand to slam your laptop.
